title: Limozeen: “But They’re in Space!”
description: The failed Saturday morning cartoon where the band Limozeen turn their tour bus into a space machine. They’re in space! The boys make sure metal stays number one throughout the galaxy.
quote: How are you going to play tonight’s show afer I turn your instruments into Italian noodles?
alt1: Limozeen running from hands and tentacles
alt2: Limozeen playing a show but their instruments are noodles
